languages.text: {n}Комиссар отвечает спокойно и горделиво.{/n} "Долг комиссара — искоренять трусость и маловерие среди воинов Его. В моем же отряде нет трусов и маловеров".
{n}The Commissar's answer is calm and composed.{/n} "A Commissar's duty is to root out cowardice and doubt among His warriors. There are no cowards or dissenters in my troop."
languages.original_text: {n}Комиссар отвечает спокойно и горделиво.{/n} "Долг комиссара — искоренять трусость и маловерие среди воинов Его. В моем же отряде нет трусов и маловеров".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Commissar's answer is calm and composed.{/n} "The Commissar's duty is to root out cowardice and doubt among His warriors. There are no cowards or naysayers in my troop."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}政委的回答冷静而沉着。{/n}“政委的职责是消灭一切意志懦弱、心存怀疑的叛徒，清洗神皇仆人的队伍。我的部队里没有懦夫，也没有异端分子。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar's answer is calm and composed.{/n} "A Commissar's duty is to root out cowardice and doubt among His warriors. There are no cowards or dissenters in my troop."

traits.locale_text: {n}政委的回答冷静而沉着。{/n}“政委的职责是消灭一切意志懦弱、心存怀疑的叛徒，清洗神皇仆人的队伍。我的部队里没有懦夫，也没有异端分子。”
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}コミッサーは極めて冷静に答える。{/n}「コミッサーの責務は戦士たちの臆病と疑念を根絶することです。私の部隊には臆病者も異議を唱える者もいません」
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar's answer is calm and composed.{/n} "A Commissar's duty is to root out cowardice and doubt among His warriors. There are no cowards or dissenters in my troop."

traits.locale_text: {n}コミッサーは極めて冷静に答える。{/n}「コミッサーの責務は戦士たちの臆病と疑念を根絶することです。私の部隊には臆病者も異議を唱える者もいません」
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}La respuesta del Comisario es tranquila y serena.{/n} «El deber de un Comisario es extirpar la cobardía y la duda de Sus guerreros. En mi tropa no hay ningún cobarde ni disidente».
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar's answer is calm and composed.{/n} "A Commissar's duty is to root out cowardice and doubt among His warriors. There are no cowards or dissenters in my troop."

traits.locale_text: {n}La respuesta del Comisario es tranquila y serena.{/n} «El deber de un Comisario es extirpar la cobardía y la duda de Sus guerreros. En mi tropa no hay ningún cobarde ni disidente».
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar's answer is calm and composed.{/n} "A Commissar's duty is to root out cowardice and doubt among His warriors. There are no cowards or dissenters in my troop."

languages.text: « Le devoir d'un commissaire est d'éradiquer la couardise et le doute parmi les soldats de l'Empereur, {n}répond-il calmement.{/n} Je peux vous assurer qu'il n'y a ni lâches ni dissidents dans mes troupes. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar's answer is calm and composed.{/n} "A Commissar's duty is to root out cowardice and doubt among His warriors. There are no cowards or dissenters in my troop."

traits.locale_text: « Le devoir d'un commissaire est d'éradiquer la couardise et le doute parmi les soldats de l'Empereur, {n}répond-il calmement.{/n} Je peux vous assurer qu'il n'y a ni lâches ni dissidents dans mes troupes. »
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}Die Antwort des Kommissars ist ruhig und überlegt.{/n} "Die Pflicht eines Kommissars lautet, Feigheit und Zweifel unter Seinen Kriegern auszumerzen. Es gibt in meiner Truppe keine Feiglinge oder Abweichler."
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar's answer is calm and composed.{/n} "A Commissar's duty is to root out cowardice and doubt among His warriors. There are no cowards or dissenters in my troop."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Antwort des Kommissars ist ruhig und überlegt.{/n} "Die Pflicht eines Kommissars lautet, Feigheit und Zweifel unter Seinen Kriegern auszumerzen. Es gibt in meiner Truppe keine Feiglinge oder Abweichler."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}Komiser, sakin ve ağırbaşlı bir şekilde cevap veriyor.{/n} "Komiserlik vazifesi, savaşçılarının korkularını ve şüphelerini gidermektir. Benim birliğimde ne korkaklara ne de muhaliflere yer vardır."
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar's answer is calm and composed.{/n} "A Commissar's duty is to root out cowardice and doubt among His warriors. There are no cowards or dissenters in my troop."

traits.locale_text: {n}Komiser, sakin ve ağırbaşlı bir şekilde cevap veriyor.{/n} "Komiserlerin görevi, savaşçılarının korkularını ve şüphelerini gidermektir. Benim birliğimde korkak ve muhalifler bulunamaz."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True
